Translations.Text: Cite pro them example hoc vita prout aqua ut nos send caelum produce plants terra tunc they turn into hay blown wind DEUS est able to perfecit TOTUS things
Moneta infans est joys hoc vita righteous works provisus eternal recompense ex tuus Dominus far bonus hope
Feria advenit when nos wipe montis vos vide terra barren Nos summon them totus non sinister single 1 de them
They presens tuus Dominus row Vos advenit nos individuals just prout nos created vos initially. Indeed hoc est quod vos claimed testimentum nunquam happen

Actum shown vos vide guilty fearful de its contents They dictus Woe to nos. Quam advenit hoc book sinister nihil parvulus magnus sine comes it They invenit everything they perfecit brought forth Tuus Dominus est nunquam unjust towards anyone
